properties.entry: SELECT NB.NOTICE_NO, NB.MANAGER_NO, NB.NOTICE_TITLE, NB.NOTICE_DETAIL, TO_CHAR(NB.NOTICE_UPLOAD_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') NOTICE_UPLOAD_DATE FROM NOTICE_BOARD NB

SELECT T.NOTICE_NO, T.MANAGER_NO, T.NOTICE_TITLE, T.NOTICE_DETAIL, T.NOTICE_UPLOAD_DATE, T.PRE_TITLE, T.NEXT_TITLE FROM ( SELECT NB.NOTICE_NO, NB.MANAGER_NO, NB.NOTICE_TITLE, NB.NOTICE_DETAIL, TO_CHAR(NB.NOTICE_UPLOAD_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') NOTICE_UPLOAD_DATE, LAG(NOTICE_TITLE) OVER(ORDER BY NOTICE_NO) PRE_TITLE, LEAD(NOTICE_TITLE) OVER(ORDER BY NOTICE_NO) NEXT_TITLE FROM NOTICE_BOARD NB ) T WHERE T.NOTICE_NO = ?
